Turning off the 2G network signal is part of the

popularizing smartphones to promote the digital

Cong River conservation group, there is still

This organization issued a report today.
research indicates that nearly one-fifth of the fish species
in this river system are facing the
risk of
extinction. According to biologist Ngoc about fish Z
hogen the river has some of the
largest and rarest fish on earth and  As
infrastructure development increases the
number of species that may
become extinct, hydroelectric dams are the
biggest culprits in making fishing difficult
on this important waterway
because they cause  Changing river flows
alters water quality and impedes
fish spawning migrations, with more than 2 million
tons of fish harvested annually,
depleting the catch in the
largest inland fishery.  world
could lead to an An Linh Lu thc threat
in the future and affect at least
40 million people in the lower Mekong River basin.
However, this expert believes that it is not
too late to join hands in coordinated efforts.
To save this river, he called for
collective action on a
large scale, thereby sustaining hope for

to store water for livestock and growing

above to the ice making site. The
cost of the project is about 6,000
USD. In the winter, the ice block has reached a
maximum height of 12 m and a diameter of 20 m.
In the summer, the ice will melt.  Is there water for the livestock?
Like last year, my livestock were
often severely thirsty. We suffered
many losses due to summer droughts. We
hope this experimental method of making artificial ice
will help provide drinking water for the current livestock.
kistan has had 24 localities piloting

1,463 m high la cumbre volcano on
fernandina island in the galapagos archipelago
of Ecuador has awakened.  started
last Saturday night and has been erupting lava
violently for a total of 8 years.
This volcano has erupted four times. The
last time the volcano erupted was in
January 2020 and lasted about 9 months.
Fernandina Island has an area of ​​about 638
km2 and is currently uninhabited, but there is a

is a native plant, it is a thistle

unknown in the
commercial market. This truly rare

canvas and is a work of
abstraction and  The woman's personal feelings
about nature currently do not have
